definition: Mongol ethnic group/abbr. for Mongolia 蒙古國|蒙古国[Meng3 gu3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Meng2]
to cover/ignorant/to suffer (misfortune)/to receive (a favor)/to cheat
to cover/to wrap/to hold/to include/to take charge of/to contract (to or for)/package/wrapper/container/bag/to hold or embrace/bundle/packet/CL:個|个[ge4],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: Nearly half of all ger dwellers live below the poverty line.
sentences.chinese: 將近一半的蒙古包居民的生活水平處於貧困線以下。

sentences.english: The white felt yurts of the Mongolian people stand out in the sunshine .
sentences.chinese: 在太陽下，那點點水泡似的蒙古包，閃爍着白光。

sentences.english: It's held in a giant yurt covered with camel hair; inside are famous cosmonauts and their families.
sentences.chinese: 慶祝在一個蓋着駱駝皮的大蒙古包裏舉行。

sentences.english: Children from the ger districts cool off in the polluted Tuul River.
sentences.chinese: 蒙古包區的孩子們正在已被污染的圖爾河中納涼。

sentences.english: Traditional houses of the Mongolians: Ger.
sentences.chinese: 蒙古人住的傳統蒙古包。

sentences.english: We sing in yurts in the evening, lie down to sleep in a row of ground floor shops.
sentences.chinese: 我們在蒙古包裏唱歌，晚上躺成一排睡地鋪。

sentences.english: While in the remote countryside, voting is taking place inside gers , tent-like structures that nomads use as a home.
sentences.chinese: 蒙古包是一種帳篷結構的建築，遊牧民們在裏面生活。

sentences.english: His yurt stood behind the temple.
sentences.chinese: 蒙古包就在那座廟背後。

sentences.english: And also the mushroom-like Mongol yurts that are scattered on the grassland.
sentences.chinese: 還有像蘑菇一樣灑落在草原上的蒙古包。

sentences.english: The gers provide sheltered accommodation as well as greater autonomy and freedom.
sentences.chinese: 蒙古包提供有庇護的住所以及更多的自主和自由。

sentences.english: Ger districts lack running water and other basic services.
sentences.chinese: 蒙古包區沒有自來水和其他基礎設施。

sentences.english: Sub-fixed and nomadic yurt-style two kinds.
sentences.chinese: 蒙古包分固定式和遊動式兩種。

sentences.english: There are no architectural structures in the Ten Thousand Trees Garden except for a few Mongolian yurts.
sentences.chinese: 萬樹園內不施土木，而按蒙古族的風俗設蒙古包數座。

sentences.english: Sunlight enters a traditional ger through gaps in the roof.
sentences.chinese: 陽光穿過帳篷頂的縫隙灑在這個傳統的蒙古包。

definition: Mongol ethnic group of north China and Inner Mongolia

pinyin: Hu1 lun2 bei4 er3 cao3 yuan2

definition: Tuva, a republic in south-central Siberia, Russia
butter tea (Tibetan, Mongolian etc drink derived from milk)
